dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
S. King
dcterms:description: The Voice Bank Corpus is a large regional accent speech database designed for speech synthesis and enhancement research.
dcterms:title: Voice Bank Corpus

dcterms:creator: J. Thiemann
N. Ito
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: The DEMAND Corpus is a collection of multi-channel recordings of acoustic noise in diverse environments, useful for noise robustness research.
dcterms:title: DEMAND Corpus

dcterms:creator: J. S. Garofolo
L. F. Lamel
W. M. Fisher
J. G. Fiscus
D. S. Pallett
N. L. Dahlgren
dcterms:description: The TIMIT Corpus is an acoustic-phonetic continuous speech corpus designed for speech recognition research.
dcterms:title: TIMIT Corpus

dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
X. Wang
S. Takaki
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: An open-source dataset that combines the Voice Bank and DEMAND corpora for investigating RNN-based speech enhancement methods.
dcterms:title: Open-source dataset (combination of Voice Bank and DEMAND)
